Crmc 6293/2013 2 2021/KER/10
V.G.ARUN, J.
" GrLM.C, No.6293 of 2013.
Dated this the 4Â° day of January, 2021
ORDER
Considering that the Crl.M.C is of the year 2013, a report
regarding the present status of the lower court proceedings was called
for. It is reported that pending the Crl.M.C, final report was filed and
the matter is pending as C.C.No.1800 of 2017 on the files of Judicial
First Class Magistrate, Ranni. Learned counsel for the petitioner
submits that in view of subsequent development, the Crl.M.C can be
closed, reserving the petitioner's liberty to seek remedies before the
jurisdictional Court. Based on the submission, the Crl.M.C is closed,
with the liberty sought.
Sd/-
V.G.ARUN
JUDGE
